221.name: Piloswine
221.description: A Pokémon covered in thick, brown fur. It is able to endure freezing temperatures.

824.name: Blipbug
824.description: A larval Pokémon. It gathers information and uses it skillfully.

916.name: Oinkologne
916.description: This Pokémon sends a flowerlike scent wafting about. Well-developed muscles in its legs allow it to leap more than 16 feet with no trouble at all.

925.name: Maushold
925.description: The little ones just appeared one day. There are now a hundred or more of them.

931.name: Squawkabilly
931.description: This Pokémon flies around in flocks of several hundred individuals. It has a calm disposition and never cries.

964.name: Palafin
964.description: This Pokémon changes its appearance if it hears its allies calling for help.

978.name: Tatsugiri
978.description: This Pokémon tricks others by mimicking the appearance of other species.

982.name: Dudunsparce
982.description: This Pokémon can dig straight down to a depth of over six miles while burrowing.
